TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SnapLine extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在使用者介面 (UI) 中動態建立的水平和垂直線段，用於協助容器中控制項的設計階段配置。

span.span: Represents the horizontal and vertical line segments that are dynamically created in the user interface (UI) to assist in the design-time layout of controls in a container.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出常見的模式，可協助您解決定位和調整大小在設計介面上的控制項的視覺化設計工具支援。The following table lists the common modes that visual design tools support to assist you with positioning and sizing controls on a design surface. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |自由格式Freeform|可讓您自由地配置控制項。Enables you to freely lay out controls.| |GridGrid|顯示可協助您配置控制項的靜態的覆疊的格線。Displays a static overlaid grid that assists you in laying out controls.| |對齊線Snapline|顯示輔助線，協助您配置相對於其他容器的控制項。Displays guide lines that assist you in laying out the container's controls relative to each other. 對齊線是來自控制項和其容器而定。Snaplines originate from controls and their container.| 類別和相關的類型說明支援的對齊線 」 模式。The class and related types help support the Snapline mode. 對齊線動態產生，並自動為控制項邊緣移至另一個控制項附近或接近其容器的界限。Snaplines are generated dynamically and automatically as a control edge moves near another control or near the boundaries of its container. 控制項是從 [工具箱] 中，新增或移動或調整大小作業滑鼠或鍵盤命令時，可能發生這項目。This can occur when a control is added from the toolbox, or moved or resized by mouse operations or keyboard commands. 控制項通常會有定義; 的水平和垂直對齊線矩形控制項，這些通常會延伸從四個邊緣。Controls typically have both horizontal and vertical snaplines defined; for rectangular controls, these typically extend from all four edges. 類別會使用只有少數屬性來描述每個對齊線下, 表所示。The class uses only a few properties to describe each snapline, as shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定的位置和方向相對於其相關聯的控制項列。Specifies the location and direction of the line with respect to its associated control. 一般而言，只有的類似類型的對齊線會自動對齊彼此。Typically, only snaplines of similar types will auto-align to each other.| ||指定的距離，單位為像素從原始伺服器，也就是控制項的左上角，以對齊線的開始位置。Specifies the distance in pixels from the origin, which is the upper-left corner of the control, to where the snapline starts.| ||指定對齊線的相對重要性。Specifies the relative importance of the snapline. 在任何指定的配置的決策點，只有作用中且具有最高優先權的對齊線會顯示。During any given layout decision point, only the snaplines that are active and have the highest priority are displayed.| ||定義對齊線的自訂的類別。Defines custom categories of snaplines. 這是選擇性的字串。This is an optional string.| | 和 and |指出是否對齊線可分別有水平或垂直方向。Indicates whether a snapline has horizontal or vertical orientation, respectively.| 類別會儲存在其對應的控制項類型的對齊線屬性。The class stores snaplines for its corresponding control type in the property. 對齊線的基底類別處理應可滿足大部分的控制項，因為它會定義， ， ，和對齊線，對齊控制項的邊緣。This base class handling of snaplines will suffice for the majority of controls, as it defines the , , , and snaplines, which are aligned along the edges of the control. 當您開發自訂控制項，如果這個預設的組織不敷使用時，覆寫類別的屬性衍生自。When you are developing a custom control, if this default organization does not suffice, override the property of the class derived from . 例如，您可能要對齊水平對齊線的文字為基礎的控制項，例如標籤，使用 top 和基準線的文字 （而不是控制項的頂端和底部邊緣）。For example, you may want to align the horizontal snaplines of text-based controls, such as labels, with the top and base lines of the text (instead of the top and bottom edges of the control). 無法從衍生類別。The class cannot be derived from. 在 Visual Studio 中的這項功能的廣泛支援，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 在 Windows Form 使用對齊線排列的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines.md)。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio, see [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using Snaplines](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-snaplines.md).

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該只明確建立對齊線來取代或補充視覺化設計工具所提供的預設對齊線行為。You should only explicitly create snaplines to replace or supplement the default snapline behavior offered by the visual designer. 若要建立對齊線，您應該執行個體對齊線，並再將它加入屬性類別。To create a snapline, you should instance a snapline and then add it to the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會將所有內容的對齊線設定程式設計人員提供的值。This constructor sets all of the properties of a snapline to programmer-supplied values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AdjustOffset(int32 adjustment) cil managed

param.name: adjustment
param.span: 要變更對齊線位移的像素數目。

span.span: The number of pixels to change the snapline offset by.

summary.span: 調整對齊線的 屬性。

span.span: Adjusts the property of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對齊線的此位移為距離，單位為像素，對齊線是位於從關聯的控制項的左上方原點。The offset of a snapline is the distance, in pixels, that the snapline is located from the associated control's upper-left origin. 雖然位移可以設定為任何整數值，但通常對齊線保留空間的關聯性所隱含其屬性值。Although the offset can be set to any integer value, typically the snaplines retain the spatial relationships implied by their property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Filter As String
public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得與這個對齊線相關聯之程式設計人員定義的篩選條件分類。

span.span: Gets the programmer-defined filter category associated with this snapline.
A that defines the filter category.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來定義的對齊線的自訂類別。The property is used to define custom categories of snaplines. 具有相同的篩選條件名稱的對齊線就能夠彼此貼齊。Only snaplines with the same filter name are able to snap to each other. 這個屬性可以用於自訂的控制項設計工具，來公開不同類別的控制項狀態或正在執行的作業類型而定的對齊線。This property can be used in custom control designers to expose different categories of snaplines depending upon the state of the control or the type of operation being performed. 比方說，圓形控制項可以提供自訂的對齊線，以篩選值的 「 中心 」。For example, round controls could offer a custom snapline with the filter value of "Center". 這個屬性在建構期間初始化，且之後無法變更。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

public: property bool IsHorizontal { bool get(); };

value.span: 如果對齊線是水平的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the snapline is horizontal; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列的對齊線類型是水平： ， ， ，和。The following snapline types are horizontal: , , , and .

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the snapline has a vertical orientation.

value.span: 如果對齊線是垂直的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the snapline is vertical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列的對齊線類型是垂直： ， ，和。The following snapline types are vertical: , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Offset As Integer
public: property int Offset { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得對齊線從相關聯控制項的原點位移的像素數目。

span.span: Gets the number of pixels that the snapline is offset from the origin of the associated control.

value.span: 對齊線的位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The offset, in pixels, of the snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源是控制項的控制項的左上角點。The origin of a control is the upper-left point of the control. 單一位移可以描述對齊線位置，因為垂直對齊線可能只能是非零值的 x 軸位移，而水平對齊線只能有非零值的 y 軸的位移。A single offset can describe the position of a snapline, because vertical snaplines may have only a nonzero x-axis offset, whereas horizontal snaplines may only have a nonzero y-axis offset. 屬性會初始化在建構階段，但它可以以進行變更之後方法。The property is initialized at construction time, but it can be changed thereafter with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Priority As SnapLinePriority

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，表示對齊線的相對重要性。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the relative importance of the snapline.
A that represents the priority category of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建立類別的控制項相關聯的對齊線的重要性。The property establishes categories of importance for the snaplines associated with a control. Windows Form 設計工具會使用這個屬性來判斷哪些對齊線，以顯示在控制項加、 調整大小或移動作業。The Windows Forms Designer uses this property to determine which snaplines to display during a control addition, resize, or move operation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration. 這個屬性在建構期間初始化，且之後無法變更。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SnapLineType As SnapLineType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得對齊線的類型，指出一般位置和方向。

span.span: Gets the type of a snapline, which indicates the general location and orientation.

value.span: ，表示對齊線相對於控制項邊緣的方向和一般位置。

span.span: A that represents the orientation and general location, relative to control edges, of a snapline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化設計工具使用導向嵌入式管理單元對齊作業的屬性。Visual designers use the property to direct snap alignment operations. 通常可以彼此貼齊方向類似的對齊線。Typically only snaplines that are similarly oriented can snap to each other. 比方說，類型的兩個對齊線可以貼齊在一起，但和無法對齊線。For example, two snaplines of type can snap together, but a and a snapline cannot. 這個屬性在建構期間初始化，且之後無法變更。This property is initialized during construction and cannot be changed thereafter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回目前對齊線的字串表示。

span.span: Returns a string representation of the current snapline.
A that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回字串，包含有關類型、 位移、 優先順序和對齊線的篩選值的詳細資料。This method returns a string that contains details about the type, offset, priority, and filter values of the snapline.
